Competition as a feature page

Win! a good hair day

Kitsch is the name in laid-back boho chic – not only are its elastic hair ties kind to your locks, but they look stylish on your wrist, too. It’s little w onder they’ve been rocking the beauty world, where they’re firm favourites with celebs such as model Gigi Hadid and actress Hilary Duff. And we can’t get enough of Kitsch’s cute temporary tattoos, either. So whether you want an easy up ’do or fancy some pretty body art, enter our free prize draw. We have 150 Kitsch sets – containing Hair Ties (5-pack) and Temporary Tattoos – worth £14 each, to give away!
Mandatory fields. If you provide a tel. number this will only be used to contact you if you are the winner. Boots will not store or pass on your data for any other purpose.
